statements.select: SELECT T2.WHB_Name FROM PIS_Inventory T1 INNER JOIN PIS_WarehouseBin T2 ON T2.WHB_ID = T1.INV_WHB_ID AND T2.WHB_IsValid = 1 WHERE T1.INV_WHB_ID IS NOT NULL AND T1.INV_WHB_ID != '' AND #WHERE_WHB_ID# LIKE '%;' + T1.INV_WHB_ID + ';%' AND T1.INV_IsValid = 1 UNION SELECT T2.WHB_Name FROM PIS_StockInDetail T1 INNER JOIN PIS_WarehouseBin T2 ON T2.WHB_ID = T1.SID_WHB_ID AND T2.WHB_IsValid = 1 WHERE T1.SID_WHB_ID IS NOT NULL AND T1.SID_WHB_ID != '' AND #WHERE_WHB_ID# LIKE '%;' + T1.SID_WHB_ID + ';%' AND T1.SID_IsValid = 1
